user.canProvide:
I am especially excited to help founders find the right design support. Here are a few common topics I can help with:

1. Recruiting designers or agencies 
2. Establishing a design-led product culture
3. Operating or supporting a design team
user.intro:
Helllo! I'm the designer on Contrary's HQ team, and I am responsible for the product experience with OS here. Prior to Contrary, I worked was part of the Product Design teams at Stripe, Lyft and Facebook.

Outside of design, I love traveling and cooking. You can always find me planning some dinner party when I'm not away from home.
user.lookingFor: Get to know our community better. I am still relatively new to the HQ team, and I would love to connect with other product and design people, and learn how the HQ team can better support you
user.meetWithBlurb: Let's chat if you have questions about recruiting designers, freelancers, or agencies, about establishing a design-led product culture, or operating/supporting a design team in your organization
